title: Wheres the MMORPG?
body: The title says it all. mmorpg based on lol lore already plz?, drown in money riot...

replies.body: I think it could be successful, assuming Riot did it right, but then there's the issue of whether Riot is willing. Back on the forums there was a lot of talk of the potential of a LoL based MMORPG though, as far as I'm aware, Riot never payed any mind to those conversations. Personally though I like the suggestions [this thread](http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=65726&highlight=mmorpg) went into, very in-depth description and discussion compared to most threads on the subject.

I would buy it like WoW, I think on the Forums' Archive this was one of the most requested ideas but then it got no recognition :< Since people hated the idea, they said MOBA's were meant to be the opposite of an MMO, able to play all characters easily and try out all their 'avatars or cash shop items.' And etc.
